revised_title: Thermal Expansion of Sea-Water: Observations and Analysis
tldr: This article presents observations and analysis of the thermal expansion of sea-water by T. E. Thorpe and A. W. Rucker. They collected water from the Atlantic and conducted experiments to determine the law of thermal expansion of sea-water. The authors compared their results with previous studies and discussed discrepancies in the methods used in those studies. The article provides a table and directions for calculating the specific gravity of sea-water at different temperatures.
